name: Hexed Time
description:
Immerse yourself in an atmospheric 2D hand-drawn adventure puzzle.

Play as a witch, who tries to live peacefully like an ordinary villager. Her life is disrupted, when she tries to do good and finds herself in a time loop, from which she has to find a way out. But it will not be easy.

On that day, the inquisition arrives in the village with only one goal: to expose and burn the witch. Find a way out of the repeating day. However, think wisely: The easiest way out may not be the most moral one...

The game has English and Czech localization. The game can be played in the browser, however, for windows users, I'd recommend downloading the files because it allows you to save your game.
